creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
description: two raucous teams of men, one team wearing red, white, and blue tie-dye, and the other wearing light blue, race alongside two horses; torii gate at R; buildings with onlookers and two fires at UL
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ, upper center
title: Narumi, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
